articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: AUS media's 'ridiculous' tweet on ICC's new Indore pitch verdict irks Indians - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Following the big news on Monday, an Australian media website called the act “ridiculous” which left Indian fans irked while a former Australia coach gave a brutal reaction. | Cricket
articles.content: In reply to the appeal made by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), ICC ran through the footages again before changing their verdict in the Indore pitch, which had hosted the third Test … [+2339 chars]
